conbody.p: By default, the HTTP Transport Framework uses the default receive buffer size of 6 KB for an HTTP session. The default receive buffer size value can be overridden by the client before the first HTTP transaction is submitted for a particular HTTP session. The default receive buffer size for a particular session can be set using the HTTP::ERecvBufferSize property.
